mapper.sql: result_id as id, result_name as name, result_value as value, target_id as targetId, cre_time as creTime
mapper.select: select from tb_result where target_id = #{targetId} order by cre_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_result (result_id, result_name, result_value, target_id, cre_time) VALUES (#{result.id}, #{result.name}, #{result.value}, #{result.targetId}, #{result.creTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE result_name = VALUES(result_name), result_value = VALUES(result_value), target_id = VALUES(target_id), cre_time = VALUES(cre_time);
